query: SELECT date_trunc_ym(contractdate) AS month, count(*) AS number_of_filings, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname WHERE contractdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname ORDER BY month, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname

filingtype.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental?

boardname.description: Name of the board on which the City Elective Officer(s) serves

table_metadata.title: SFEC Form 126f4 - Notification of Contract Approval - Filings
table_metadata.description: Dataset of contracts approved by City elective officers with a value of $100,000 or more, detailing the filing and approval process.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: policy analysts, government officials, economic researchers

whom_it_may_interest: Government officials, researchers in government finance and contracting, business analysts
filename: SFEC Form 126f4 - Notification of Contract Approval - Filings.json
title: SFEC Form 126f4 - Notification of Contract Approval - Filings
